## Loading the data

This project is so interesting and relevant to my life! 

```{r, include = FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
join1 <- contributions %>%
  inner_join(committees, by = "cmte_id") %>%
  select("cmte_id", "cmte_dsgn", "cmte_type", "cmte_party_affiliation", "org_type", "transaction_type", "transaction_amt")

join1 <- join1 %>%
  filter(cmte_party_affiliation %in% c("DEM", "REP"))
```
